Free shipping on this product for a limited period only.
Beautifully hand crafted in quality Moroccan leather, this bag has that executive look you require.
Suede lined and complete with a stunning vocal point click fastening. This bag truly stands out all the way through to the stitching. Hand carried or with the detachable shoulder strap and plenty of room for the daily essentials of the man or women on the go!

name: Tan - Gladstone Bag
description: This hand crafted Moroccan Gladstone bag is made of high quality leather. A luxury weekend bag, fully lined, with an internal zipped pocket. The bag has six brass feet for protection to the base, hand held or with a detachable shoulder strap. These bags have a timeless elegance. Available in two sizes as follows or can be purchased as a set with a £10.00 saving. Medium bag D 30cm x L 51cm x W 23cm Large bag D 38cm x L 58cm X W 23cm

name: Tan Leather Holdall
description:
This beautiful hand crafted Moroccan leather holdall is the epitome of style and fashion combined.  Crafted from high quality leather and lightly padded for protection and durability, with five brass feet for protection to the base.  It has a large internal compartment which is lined and two external pockets; it also has a detachable shoulder strap.  This smart and spacious bag will allow you to ‘’arrive in style’’ at any destination.

D 38cm x L 56cm X W 29cm
